User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the EduVault AI application.

ChatHistory.title: ChatHistory
ChatHistory.description: Represents a single chat conversation between the user and the AI tutor.

id.description: Unique identifier for the chat history entry.

userMessage.description: The message sent by the user.

aiResponse.description: The response generated by the AI tutor.

uploadedFiles.description: Files uploaded as part of this chat. (Relationship: ChatHistory 1:N FileUpload)

StudyMaterial.title: StudyMaterial
StudyMaterial.description: Represents a study material generated after a conversation.

id.description: Unique identifier for the study material.

materialType.description: Type of study material (e.g., mind map, revision notes, Q&A).

content.description: The content of the study material (e.g., a JSON representation of a mind map, text of revision notes).

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the study material was generated.

FileUpload.title: FileUpload
FileUpload.description: Represents a file uploaded by the user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the uploaded file.

fileType.description: MIME type of the uploaded file.

fileSize.description: Size of the uploaded file in bytes.

uploadTimestamp.description: Timestamp of when the file was uploaded.

fileContent.description: Content of the uploaded file (e.g., Base64 encoded string).
